name: Activepieces
longDescription: Activepieces is a relatively new no-code workflow automation tool that allows users to set up workflows to streamline repetitive tasks. This Activepieces review will provide an in-depth look at the platform's features, use cases, pricing, support, and more to help you determine if it's the right automation solution for your needs.
description: Activepieces is a cloud-based platform that aims to make workflow automation accessible for everyone, even those without coding skills.
